mapper.select: select enterprise.*,COUNT(u1.id) as userNumber,u2.trueName as createuserName FROM enterprise left join sec_user as u1 on enterprise.id = u1.enterprise_id LEFT join sec_user as u2 on enterprise.createuser = u2.id WHERE enterprise.disabled = 0 GROUP BY enterprise.id
mapper.update: update enterprise set name = #{enterprise.name}, address = #{enterprise.address}, intro = #{enterprise.intro}, longitude = #{enterprise.longitude}, latitude = #{enterprise.latitude}, filiale = #{enterprise.filiale}, mapper_user1 = #{enterprise.mapperUser1}, mapper_user1_pic = #{enterprise.mapperUser1Pic}, mapper_user2 = #{enterprise.mapperUser2}, mapper_user2_pic = #{enterprise.mapperUser2Pic}, mapper_user3 = #{enterprise.mapperUser3}, mapper_user3_pic = #{enterprise.mapperUser3Pic} where id = #{enterprise.id}
